issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Seal of a wreath on a tomb with motto SI RECTE FACIES (If you perform righteously).
issue_obverse_legend_s: Continental Currency | THE UNITED STATES | Thirty Dollars. | This BILL entitles the Bearer to receive THIRTY Spanish milled DOLLARS, or the Value thereof in Gold or Silver, ac-cording to a Resolu-tion passed by Con-gress at Philadelphia, Sept. 26th, 1778. XXX DOLLARS.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Nature print of three willow leaves.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Thirty DOLLARS. | Printed by HALL and SEL-LERS. 1778.
